publicwhip.spmotion: * S2M-2574 Fiona Hyslop:Addiewell Prison—That the Parliament recognises local opposition to the construction of a private prison at Addiewell in West Lothian; notes the content of the BBC programme, “Prison Undercover – the Real Story”, broadcast on 9 March 2005, in highlighting conditions at the Kilmarnock private prison which provides further evidence of the problems of the private sector in operating prisons, and calls on the Scottish Executive to reconsider any decisions made about building, operating and managing a new prison at Addiewell as a private project.
S2M-2574 Addiewell Prison (lodged on 11 March 2005) Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Christine Grahame*
S2M-2574 Addiewell Prison (lodged on 11 March 2005) Tommy Sheridan*
